Inventory

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Inventory.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Inventory
extends javafx.application.Application
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Compatible Feature for future dev release: The program can be updated so that as products are created using parts, the parts available count decreases when it is input as a product component. As of now, it was not required by the prompts, and so was not implemented. A requirement for a prompt/message dialog to be interacted with and closed before being allowed to click more buttons on the main application screen would also be beneficial.

      • addProduct

        public static void addProduct(Product newProduct)
        Uses the built-in functions of the tables to perform the necessary actions of adding, deleting, getting, updating, and searching for products. The 2 lookupProduct methods could have been used to search for matching products as the search field by creating a new observable list or returning the observable list returned, and setting that to the tableview via button clicks to search and reset.
        Parameters:
        newProduct - the product to add to the product table.

      • deleteProduct

        public static boolean deleteProduct(Product selectedProduct)
        Parameters:
        selectedProduct - the selected product to delete.
        Returns:
        a boolean if the product was successfully deleted or not.

      • getAllProducts

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
        Returns:
        the list of all products.

      • updateProduct

        public static void updateProduct(int index,
                                 Product newProduct)
        Parameters:
        index - the location in the table of the product to modify
        newProduct - the new product (data) to update into the product table.

      • lookupProduct

        public static Product lookupProduct(int productId)
        Parameters:
        productId - the int id value to search for in the product table.
        Returns:
        the part with a matching int id value.

      • lookupProduct

        Parameters:
        productName - the string name value to search for in the product table.
        Returns:
        an observable list with all products matching by String name value.
